subject: Re: CreateProcess error (JUnit and Visual J++)
msgSnippet: I have indeed set the class path and recompiled the code. I believe there is a special version of JUnit for Visual Age Java or some other IDE. What were the
messageBody:
I have indeed set the class path and recompiled the code.

I believe there is a special version of JUnit for Visual Age Java or
some other IDE. What were the issues there? Could my problems with
J++ be of a similar vein? Or am I just clutching at straws?



--- In junit@y..., Hrishikesh <rushi_kesh@y...> wrote:
> have u et the class path for that
> have u recompiled the code
> then it hould work fine
>
>
> --- kr1shnak@h... wrote: > Hi,
> >

> > code that comes with
> > the JUnit distribution. I am using JUnit version 3.7
> > (from
> > www.junit.org). I am using the instructions in the
> > ReadMe file: java

> > am using Visual
> > J++.
